column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I had breakfast there this morning
column2: and it was delectable- eggs (scrambled) applewood bacon
column3: hashbrowns and plain pancakes. I'll go ahead and admit it now- I'm a purist. They have a bunch of specialty pancakes on the menu
column4: but I like mine with maple syrup and butter
column5: and that's it. I will definitely PASS on the Oreo S'more pancakes with marshmallow fluff
column6: choc chips and oreo cookie crumbs
column7: ($8.95) thankyouverymuch. The cakes I had were absolutely delicious!!!!!!
